app.name: Point85 OEE Application
home.page.title: Point85 OEE
home.about.text:
The Point85 Overall Equipment Effectiveness (OEE) applications enable collection of equipment data from multiple sources to support OEE calculations of performance, availability and quality.

For more information please visit https://github.com/Point85/OEE-Designer.
